column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/c773c101ec777ba472e35c33178b8f49e47e26d8 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Closing due to inactivity. Let me know if you intend to work on this again, then I'll reopen it (or alternatively open a new pull).\n
Okay, I'll let you know!  thanks for changing the world\n
Please don't add this to the build instructions. The proper place would be the bootstrap guide https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/bootstrap.md .\n
I'm not sure this is still correct, if I remember correctly Gavin is moving away from MacPorts for building/releases because it's troublesome to get it installed in an OSX 10.6 virtual machine.\n
Agreed, homebrew is definitely the preferred and most reliable way.\n
